subject: Inquiry Regarding Promotion Opportunities
body:
Dear [Recipient Name],

I am writing to express my interest in potential promotion opportunities within the team. I have consistently exceeded expectations in my current role as [Your Current Role] for the past [Number] years/months, and I am confident in my ability to take on increased responsibilities and contribute at a higher level.

I am eager to learn more about the potential pathways for advancement and discuss how my skills and experience align with the needs of the company. Would you be available for a brief conversation sometime next week to discuss this further?

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

Hariom
